title: Periodic Phenomena - determining a true statement

content.question: ​The periodic function <math alttext="y equals g open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> has a period of <math alttext="6"><semantics><mn>6</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. It is known that <math alttext="g open parentheses 1 close parentheses equals g open parentheses 7 close parentheses equals 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mn>1</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mn>7</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and that <math alttext="g open parentheses 5 close parentheses equals 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mn>5</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a relative maximum of <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following must also be true?

choices.label: ​The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> must be increasing on <math alttext="0 less than x less than 5"><semantics><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and decreasing on <math alttext="5 less than x less than 7"><semantics><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​<math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses greater or equal than 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for all values of <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​<math alttext="g open parentheses 18 close parentheses not equal to g open parentheses 4 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mn>18</mn></mfenced><mo>≠</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mn>4</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="g open parentheses 3 close parentheses equals g open parentheses 27 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mn>27</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="g open parentheses 3 close parentheses equals g open parentheses 27 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mn>3</mn></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mn>27</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
